Content: The outgoing General Officer Commanding (GOC), 59 Division, Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya was presented a Guard Turnout and a formal Guard of Honour at the 59 Divisional Headquarters in Nandikadal on Thursday (11). An all rank tea and a troops address to the outgoing GOC marked the event. Brigade Commanders of the 591, 592, 593 Brigades, Senior Officers, Officers and Other Ranks attended the occasion.
